name: To Me Squad!
story_text: You lead your allies in a charge.

low.conditions: one ally within 10 squares can use the Charge main action as a free triggered action and can use a melee strike signature ability instead of a free strike for the charge

mid.conditions: one ally within 10 squares can use the Charge main action as a free triggered action and can use a melee strike signature ability that gains an edge instead of a free strike for the charge

high.conditions: two allies within 10 squares can use the Charge main action as a free triggered action and can each use a melee strike signature ability that gains an edge instead of a free strike for the charge

effect: If the target is hit with two or more strikes as part of this ability and they have R < STRONG, they are dazed (save ends). If the target is reduced to 0 Stamina before one or both allies has made their strike, the ally or allies can pick a different target.
